titles.title: National Transit Frontline Workforce Training Act of 2020
National Transit Frontline Workforce Training Act of 2020
National Transit Frontline Workforce Training Act of 2020
A bill to amend title 49, United States Code, to establish a National Transit Frontline Workforce Training Center, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs
